response.original_title: What We Do in the Cinema
response.overview: A film bro is on a first date in his natural habitat, a screening of the vampire classic 'Nosferatu' (1922), armed with obscure film facts, and accompanied by his beautiful but weird date. But will his date get what she desires?
response.tagline: A first date with a film bro that sucks!
response.title: What We Do in the Cinema
